ASUS ExpertCenter D700MD Core i5 12th Gen Desktop PC

The ASUS ExpertCenter D700MD Desktop PC features an Intel 12th Gen Core i5-12400 CPU with speeds ranging from 2.5 GHz to 4.0 GHz and an amazing 18 MB cache, providing unrivaled performance for your work. With 8GB of high-speed DDR4 3200MHz RAM, you may multitask with ease, providing fast transitions between apps and effective handling of data-intensive activities. The large 1TB SATA 7200RPM HDD provides enough of storage for your papers, files, and entertainment, helping to keep your workspace organized and clutter-free. This PC comes with an Acer USB keyboard and mouse, which improves your entire user experience. This system adapts to your demands whether you're plunging into work, content production, or enjoyment. Upgrade your workstation with the ASUS ExpertCenter D700MD Core i5 12th Gen Desktop PC, which provides top-tier processing power, ample memory, and ample storage - all geared to help you with your everyday computing activities.

full_description:
Asus ExpertCenter D5 SFF D500SD Core i5 12th Gen Desktop PC

The Asus ExpertCenter D5 SFF D500SD Core i5 12th Gen Desktop PC is a flexible, high-performance computing solution designed to satisfy the diversified demands of today's businesses and professionals. Its core is the powerful Intel 12th Gen Core i5-12400 CPU, which delivers great computing power with basic clock rates of 2.5 GHz, turbo boost up to 4.0 GHz, and a generous 18 MB cache. Whether you're running productivity programs, multitasking between jobs, or tackling compute-intensive workloads, the D500SD provides smooth and responsive performance to keep you busy all day. This desktop PC comes equipped with 8GB of high-speed DDR4 3200MHz RAM, providing adequate memory bandwidth for seamless multitasking and effective workflow management. Whether you're handling many programs concurrently, operating virtual computers, or editing enormous files, the D500SD provides the necessary resources to handle your workload with ease. The bundled 1TB SATA 7200RPM hard drive provides enough of room for storing documents, presentations, video files, and software programs. With its high-speed rotating drive, you may access your data fast and effectively, resulting in smooth performance and short wait times. The Asus ExpertCenter D5 SFF D500SD includes a USB keyboard and mouse, giving simple input choices straight out of the box. Whether you're producing reports, managing spreadsheets, or browsing the internet, these peripherals provide dependable performance and comfort for lengthy usage. The D500SD is designed for efficiency and dependability, with a small Small Form Factor (SFF) design that allows it to be used in space-constrained work situations without losing performance. Its strong build quality and excellent cooling solutions provide dependable performance even under severe workloads, giving you piece of mind for mission-critical activities. Whether you're a small company owner, a remote worker, or a professional looking for a reliable computing solution, the Asus ExpertCenter D5 SFF D500SD Core i5 12th Gen Desktop PC has the performance, adaptability, and dependability to meet and exceed your expectations.
